Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|すす|yomi=k}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=|-}}, first attested in the ''{{w|Kojiki}}'' (712 {{CE}}).

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|すす|スス}}

# [[soot]]
# soot and [[dust]] [[accumulate]]d in [[ceiling]]s, etc.
# {{short for|lang=ja|煤色|tr=susuiro|nodot=1|sort=すす}}: the [[color]] of soot
